summary: This is an email forwarding a New York Times article reporting that the Paris prosecutor has opened an investigation into the Jeffrey Epstein scandal. The email was sent from an iPhone on August 23, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the scandal that is the subject of the Paris prosecutor's investigation.

events.title: Paris Prosecutor Opens Investigation
events.description: The Paris prosecutor's office opens an investigation into the Jeffrey Epstein scandal.

keyFacts: The Paris prosecutor's office opened an investigation into the Jeffrey Epstein scandal.
The news was reported by The New York Times on August 23, 2019.
The information was shared via email, sent from an iPhone.
